testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Make sure all the preconditions listed are met. They will be required by upcoming tests. 2) Make sure at least 100 address book items exist!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findAddressBookItems Fast enough Find 100 items in less than 500ms
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
